summary: Board your own ship and travel across Tamriel, looting, fighting and exploring. Are you ready for this, captain?
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Board your own ship and travel across Tamriel, looting, fighting and exploring. See screenshots for more details.[/size]

Current version: [color=red]BETA[/color]
~no encounters are available yet
~more dialogues and plot will be imported in future
~jail quest in Sentinel is not finished yet
~bugfixes if require and much more addons in future
~[b]no beginning quest finished; type in the console
 [i]setstage ISAqControlShipSolitude 5[/i] 
to make appear the ship in Solitude\'s port[/b]

           [size=4][u]Installation:[/u][/size]
put folder in X:.../steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
[b]Important![/b] You must disable borders. To make that find file \"Skyrim.ini\" in documents/my games/skyrim .Open it in notepad and under section [general] type
[i]bBorderRegionsEnabled=0[/i]
and save file.

           [size=4][u]Requirements:[/u][/size]
Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn dlc
author: Vartisharan
